definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Zhu Wei is proudly defiant about his approach to ink painting.
sentences.chinese: 朱伟对自己的水墨画带有叛逆性的自豪。

sentences.english: The color ink wash paintings of Zhu Wei are a case in point.
sentences.chinese: 水墨画家朱伟的水墨画就是一个很好的例子。

sentences.english: The color ink wash paintings of Zhu Wei are a case in point.
sentences.chinese: 水墨画家朱伟的水墨画就是一个很好的例子。

sentences.english: Her paintings combine the Chinese ink and wash style with Western impressionism.
sentences.chinese: 她的作品融合了中国水墨画和西方印象派的风格。

sentences.english: In recent years, I do park in the ink area, now in its characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，我园在水墨画方面下工夫，现已初具特色。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter pondered relations between the ink play and the present contemporary ink and wash painting.
sentences.chinese: 第五章对墨戏和现当代水墨画的关系加以简单思考。

sentences.english: First, teaching the game of ink.
I vow not to make anymore ink paintings every time I visit Liulichang.
sentences.chinese: 每次去琉璃厂都发誓以后再也不画水墨画了。

sentences.english: Hundred mile Lijiang River's each view, is a typical Chinese ink and wash painting .
sentences.chinese: 百里漓江的每一处景致，都是一幅典型的中国水墨画。

sentences.english: One could say that Wang Jinsong's ink painting is a reflection of his love of freedom.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，王劲松的水墨画是他自由心性的写照。

sentences.english: What are the differences between Chinese painting and wash painting?
sentences.chinese: 中国画与水墨画的区别到底在哪里呢？

sentences.english: Beautiful Xitang just like Chinese ink painting.
sentences.chinese: 美丽的西塘就像中国的水墨画一样迷人。

sentences.english: Two painters are painting ink and wash painting during my performance.
sentences.chinese: 我边表演，两位画家边画水墨画。

sentences.english: This is a very rare representational language in contemporary Chinese ink painting.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种现代中国水墨画极其少见的表现语言。

definition: freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)
water from a mountain/mountains and rivers/scenery/landscape
to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
